# nih-plug Template

A template for creating [nih-plug](https://github.com/robbert-vdh/nih-plug) plugins using `cargo-generate`.

This is a fork of [nih-plug-template](https://github.com/robbert-vdh/nih-plug-template) modified to use `cargo-generate` instead of `cookiecutter`.

## Usage

First, install `cargo-generate`:

```bash
cargo install cargo-generate
```

Then, generate a new project:

```bash
cargo generate --git https://github.com/flathill404/nih-plug-template
```
